statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_campaign_performance;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_spend FROM social_media_campaign_performance WHERE total_spend > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM social_media_campaign_performance WHERE impressions > 5000;
SELECT end_date, start_date FROM social_media_campaign_performance ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM social_media_campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 10 ORDER BY clicks ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_spend, impressions FROM social_media_campaign_performance WHERE total_spend > 1000 ORDER BY total_spend DESC
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM social_media_campaign_performance WHERE conversions > 5 ORDER BY clicks DESC, impressions ASC
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaign_performance WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT campaign_name, total_spend, clicks FROM social_media_campaign_performance WHERE total_spend BETWEEN 500 AND 2000 ORDER BY clicks DESC
SELECT campaign_name, impressions, conversions FROM social_media_campaign_performance WHERE impressions > 100000 AND conversions < 10 ORDER BY impressions DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT total_impressions, total_clicks, click_through_rate FROM campaign_performance_data WHERE campaign_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_id, total_impressions AS impressions, total_clicks AS clicks FROM campaign_performance_data ORDER BY impressions DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';

SELECT campaign_name, total_impressions, total_clicks FROM social_media_campaigns JOIN campaign_performance_data ON social_media_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance_data.campaign_id WHERE total_impressions > 1000;

SELECT campaign_name, click_through_rate FROM social_media_campaigns JOIN campaign_performance_data ON social_media_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_performance_data.campaign_id WHERE click_through_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY click_through_rate DESC;

SELECT campaign_id, SUM(total_impressions) AS total_impressions, SUM(total_clicks) AS total_clicks FROM campaign_performance_data GROUP BY campaign_id HAVING total_clicks > 5000 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics
SELECT channel_name, platform, followers FROM social_media_channels
SELECT campaign_name, budget, status FROM social_media_campaigns
SELECT campaign_id, impressions, clicks, conversions FROM campaign_metrics
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC, budget ASC, campaign_name
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE status='Active' ORDER BY end_date ASC
SELECT campaign_name, budget, status FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 AND status='Active' ORDER BY budget DESC

SELECT cm.clicks, cm.conversions, smc.channel_name FROM campaign_metrics cm JOIN social_media_campaigns sc ON cm.campaign_id = sc.campaign_id JOIN social_media_channels smc ON smc.channel_id = cm.metric_id WHERE cm.clicks > 100 ORDER BY cm.conversions DESC
SELECT * FROM campaign_metrics WHERE spend BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000 ORDER BY spend DESC, impressions ASC
SELECT * FROM campaign_data;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM campaign_data ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type FROM ad_data WHERE ad_cost > 100.00;
SELECT impression_id, ad_id, impression_date, impression_count FROM impression_data ORDER BY impression_count DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ad_data WHERE ad_cost > 1000 ORDER BY ad_cost DESC
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaign_data WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT campaign_name, ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM campaign_data JOIN ad_data ON campaign_data.campaign_id = ad_data.campaign_id WHERE campaign_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY ad_cost ASC
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, COUNT(click_id) AS click_count FROM ad_data JOIN click_data ON ad_data.ad_id = click_data.ad_id GROUP BY ad_name, ad_type ORDER BY click_count DESC
SELECT impression_date, SUM(impression_count) AS total_impressions FROM impression_data GROUP BY impression_date HAVING total_impressions > 1000 ORDER BY impression_date DESC
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT platform_name, platform_type FROM ad_platforms ORDER BY platform_name DESC;
SELECT ad_content, ad_cost FROM campaign_ads WHERE campaign_id = 2 ORDER BY ad_cost ASC;
SELECT request_id, user_id, request_date FROM report_requests WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM social_media_campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;

SELECT campaign_name, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM social_media_campaigns JOIN campaign_metrics ON social_media_campaigns.campaign_id = campaign_metrics.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name HAVING total_impressions > 100000;
SELECT platform_name, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks FROM ad_platforms JOIN campaign_ads ON ad_platforms.platform_id = campaign_ads.platform_id GROUP BY platform_name ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(request_id) AS total_requests FROM report_requests WHERE request_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28' GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_requests > 5;
